ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] undead bard question
ygData.msgSnippet: When you are ready for the undead bard do this: 1. Go on a Trak raid. If you don t die, get killed by a mob there in the lair. Get rezzed but leave your
ygData.messageBody:
When you are ready for the undead bard do this:

1. Go on a Trak raid. If you don't die, get killed by a mob there in the
lair. Get rezzed but leave your corpse. Go chill, get xp etc. About 18 hours
later zone into Seb and use Corpse Locate song on yourself to target your
corpse. Then sing Solidarity of Vision on your corpse. You will bind sight
and have a clear view of the lair.

Arud Bastad
57 Troubadour on Bristlebane
"I'm a singer not a swinger"

-----Original Message-----
From:
sentto-160851-25768-1011604667-matosvr=theriver.com@...
[mailto:sentto-160851-25768-1011604667-matosvr=theriver.com@....y
ahoo.com]On Behalf Of Bill Costlow
Sent: Monday, January 21, 2002 2:18 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] undead bard question



OK, Trakanon is down, undead bard spawns around 18 hours later. he is
killed.
Does he spawn again before (the real) Trakanon does or do I need to wait?
Anybody know?
Really frustrating not knowing if the guy is up until you are practically
on top of him. Thanks in advance to anyone who can help.
Tyunes
Bard of 55 songs
Rodcet Nife
